Name: Londoner (Ward's recipe)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
Review: As a born and bred Londoner, I'm slightly miffed that a New Yorker has applied the name of our great city to a drink using French and Italian products, but as it's Phil Ward and a great gin-based drink, I'll forgive him and mix up another.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Philip Ward while at Pegu Club , New York City, USA and brought to our attention by the super imbiber and scribe Gary "gaz" Regan , RIP.
Nutrition: One serving of Londoner (Ward's recipe) contains 171 calories
